TopicTitle: Decicated modules/parts to turn asteroids into full-on legit spacecraft (similar to IZ)

Articles.Content:
After watching a few episodes of Invader Zim, I remembered that one episode "Battle of the Planets," where the Martians turned their home planet into a giant spaceship, and I was curious if anyone could make a dedicated set of modules/parts (some require KAS & KIS) that would allow any player to make asteroids into spaceships.

If this mod isn't made yet, anyone can take a class-E asteroid and add some engines and a command module to it and take a screenshot of their creation - I don't mind

Edited October 9, 2015 by AJTheMighty

Pretty much everything you listed can be done using only tweakscale.

Apart from that there is a mod by RoverDude specific to asteroids but it needs to be updated it seems.
There's really no need for a dedicated mod pack. Just use KIS and attach stuff (command pod, fuel tank, engine) to an asteroid. Use a drill and ore tank to mine the asteroid itself for fuel.
